channel.title: Whonix (GW+WS) 16, issue with fasttrack.debian.net (unexpected TLS packet)
channel.description:
Hi - Hit the following error when running upgrade-nonroot on my whonix 16 (WS+GW) today(Virtualbox):
upgrade-nonroot Hit:1 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye InRelease Ign:2 tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease Hit:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye-updates InRelease Hit:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security bullseye-security InRelease Hit:5 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye-backports InRelease Ign:2 tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease Ign:2 tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease Err:2 tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease Could not handshake: An unexpected TLS packet was received. [IP: 127.0.0.1 9050] Reading package lists... Done E: Failed to fetch tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian/dists/bullseye-fasttrack/InRelease Could not handshake: An unexpected TLS packet was received. [IP: 127.0.0.1 9050] E: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.
Restarted host, but same error - So downloaded latest ova (Whonix-XFCE-16.0.8.2.ova), and am running into the same issue on both GW+WS?
Any suggestions, greatly appreciated.
Thanks

item.title: Whonix (GW+WS) 16, issue with fasttrack.debian.net (unexpected TLS packet)
item.dc:creator: frankgrimes
item.description:
Ah - Awesome thank you.

Side note - The issue appears to be resolved in Debian (I am no longer getting the TLS error from fasttrack)

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix (GW+WS) 16, issue with fasttrack.debian.net (unexpected TLS packet)

item.title: Whonix (GW+WS) 16, issue with fasttrack.debian.net (unexpected TLS packet)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 13 Aug 22

Follow Whonix ™ Developments

It is absolutely crucial to subscribe to and read the latest Whonix ™ news category 'important-news' to stay in touch with ongoing developments. This way users benefit from notifications concerning important security advisories, potential upgrade...

update issue - fasttrack: 500 SSL error: wrong version number / unexpected TLS packet News
issue: Err:4 http://HTTPS///fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease 500 SSL error: wrong version number [IP: 127.0.0.1 3142] workaround here: https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Operating_System_Software_and_Updates#fasttrack_500_SSL_error:_wrong_version_number (Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix (GW+WS) 16, issue with fasttrack.debian.net (unexpected TLS packet)

item.title: Whonix (GW+WS) 16, issue with fasttrack.debian.net (unexpected TLS packet)
item.dc:creator: frankgrimes
item.description:
Hi - Hit the following error when running upgrade-nonroot on my whonix 16 (WS+GW) today(Virtualbox):

upgrade-nonroot
Hit:1 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye InRelease
Ign:2 tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease
Hit:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye-updates InRelease
Hit:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security bullseye-security InRelease
Hit:5 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye-backports InRelease
Ign:2 tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease
Ign:2 tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease
Err:2 tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease
Could not handshake: An unexpected TLS packet was received. [IP: 127.0.0.1 9050]
Reading package lists… Done
E: Failed to fetch tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian/dists/bullseye-fasttrack/InRelease Could not handshake: An unexpected TLS packet was received. [IP: 127.0.0.1 9050]
E: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.

Restarted host, but same error - So downloaded latest ova (Whonix-XFCE-16.0.8.2.ova), and am running into the same issue on both GW+WS?

Any suggestions, greatly appreciated.

Thanks

Read full topic
